author: rajith
msg: This commit adds ACL checks for creation and deletion of federation links.
The AclModule.h was modified to have a defaut value for params in the authorize method.

author: rajith
msg: Added a default value for param in authorize and lookup methods in Acl.h and AclData.h.
This enables the user to call authorize and lookup safely without having to pass params.
Fixed a minor bug in AclReader.cpp to allow the following permission

author: ddam
msg: - renamed baseDn to searchDn in LdapEntityDaoConfiguration, reused baseDN for the ldap server's base DN

author: bentmann
msg: o Decoupled it0031 from production plugin
